Package org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.adaptive

Contains adaptive load balancing SPI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GridAdaptiveLoadBalancingSpiMBean Management MBean for GridAdaptiveLoadBalancingSpi SPI.
GridAdaptiveLoadProbe Pluggable implementation of node load probing.
 

Class Summary
GridAdaptiveBenchmarkLoadProbe Probe that uses GridLocalNodeBenchmark for specifying load for every node.
GridAdaptiveCpuLoadProbe Implementation of node load probing based on CPU load.
GridAdaptiveJobCountLoadProbe Implementation of node load probing based on active and waiting job count.
GridAdaptiveLoadBalancingSpi Load balancing SPI that adapts to overall node performance.
GridAdaptiveProcessingTimeLoadProbe Implementation of node load probing based on total job processing time.
 

Package org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.adaptive Description

Contains adaptive load balancing SPI. For more information on load balancing SPI see Load Balancing SPI on Wiki.
